list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a yellow precious metal, the chemical element of atomic number 79, used especially in jewelry and decoration and to guarantee the value of currencies.
a deep lustrous yellow or yellow-brown color.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her eyes were light green and flecked with gold

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her ankles and wrists were glinting with gold

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: made of or colored like gold.
